alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 8:55AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gadsden and Leon Counties through 945 AM EST... At 854 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Quincy, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Jamieson, Iamonia, Quincy Airport, Tallahassee Mall, Bloxham, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall and Lake Talquin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
